name: We're Already Dead
description:
In a post apocalyptic world you can't kill your enemies... or your friends!

Get your friends to safety by any means necessary.

Keep demons from reaping your undead souls.

Stick it to the Ma- I mean demon!

Survive the apocalypse!

Controls

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Fire Harpoon: left click

Grab/Throw Barrels: right click
